com.illcode.hl7

Class HL7Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illcode.hl7.HL7Parser

  • public final class HL7Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses HL7v2 text into an instance of Message.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HL7Parser()
      Constuct an HL7Parser with default parameters.
      HL7Parser(HL7Params params)
      Constuct an HL7Parser with the given parameters.
      HL7Parser(java.lang.String hl7msg)
      Constuct an HL7Parser with parameters derived from the given HL7 message.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HL7Parser

        public HL7Parser()
        Constuct an HL7Parser with default parameters.

      • HL7Parser

        public HL7Parser(HL7Params params)
        Constuct an HL7Parser with the given parameters.

      • HL7Parser

        public HL7Parser(java.lang.String hl7msg)
        Constuct an HL7Parser with parameters derived from the given HL7 message. This message must begin with an MSH segment, so that the delimeters and escape character can be derived.

    • Method Detail

      • getParams

        Parse text as a single HL7 message.
        Parameters:
        hl7msg - HL7v2 text to parse
        Returns:

      • slurpReaderText

        public static java.lang.String slurpReaderText(java.io.Reader r,
                               int bufferSize)
        Read all characters available from a Reader and return them as a string. We use a BufferedReader internally to make the process more efficient.
        Parameters:
        r - Reader from which to read characters
        bufferSize - buffer size for our BufferedReader
        Returns:
        String read from the reader, or null if an exception occurred
